headline: Is LyondellBasell (LYB) Now A Potential Opportunity After Its Recent 30 Day Share Price Jump?
summary: Wondering if LyondellBasell Industries is a bargain or a value trap at its current share price? This article walks through the key signals that can help you frame that question more clearly. The stock recently closed at US$50.47, with a 30 day return of 16.2% and a year to date return of 13.7%, even though the 1 year return sits at a 28.8% decline and the 3 year return at a 36.4% decline. These moves come as investors continue to reassess large chemicals and materials names, where sentiment...
